trans-unit.source: Stores state information while executing <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> or <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar statusinformation vid körning av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> klasser.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> class by using the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> and the object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> och objekt som ska köras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that guarantees that the expression is configured correctly.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> som garanterar att uttrycket är korrekt konfigurerad.

trans-unit.source: The current object to be executed.
validation or thisObject is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: validationeller thisObject är en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> class by using the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref>, the object to be executed, and the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for the current activity.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref>, objekt som ska köras och <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> för den aktuella aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> that guarantees that the expression is configured correctly.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> som garanterar att uttrycket är korrekt konfigurerad.

trans-unit.source: The current object to be executed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in which the rule is being executed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> i som regeln körs.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in which the rule is being executed.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for the current Activity.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> för den aktuella aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rule execution was stopped.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om regelutförandet har stoppats.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the rule execution was stopped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om regelutförandet har stoppats. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det aktuella objektet ska köras.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the validation instance for the expression to execute.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger validering-instans för uttryck som ska köras.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> for the expression to execute.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> för uttrycket som ska köras.
